attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2007-0465

Date: 2007-03-30

Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que l'honorable Leo D. Barry, juge de la Division de première instance de la Cour suprême de Terre‑Neuve-et-Labrador, soit nommé juge d'appel de la Cour d'appel de la Cour suprême de Terre‑Neuve‑et‑Labrador, et membre d'office de la Division de première instance de la Cour suprême de Terre‑Neuve‑et‑Labrador.


The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that the Honourable Leo D. Barry, a Judge of the Trial Division of the Supreme Court of Newfoundland and Labrador, be appointed a Judge of Appeal of the Court of Appeal of the Supreme Court of Newfoundland and Labrador, and a member ex officio of the Trial Division of the Supreme Court of Newfoundland and Labrador.

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that the Honourable Leo D. Barry, a Judge of the Trial Division of the Supreme Court of Newfoundland and Labrador, be appointed a Judge of Appeal of the Court of Appeal of the Supreme Court of Newfoundland and Labrador, and a member ex officio of the Trial Division of the Supreme Court of Newfoundland and Labrador.
